closed_reason: Refactored ticks.Client to use runrecord.Store: added runrecordStore field to Client struct, updated SetRunRecord to delegate to runrecordStore.Write(), updated GetRunRecord to delegate to runrecordStore.Read(). Run records now stored at .tick/logs/records/<id>.json instead of embedded in tick JSON. Updated all 5 related tests to verify new storage location.
description: Change SetRunRecord and GetRunRecord in internal/ticks/client.go to use the new runrecord.Store instead of storing in the tick JSON file's 'run' field. The client should create a runrecord.Store and delegate to it.
title: Update ticks.Client to use runrecord store instead of embedding in tick JSON
